"},{"text":"Potion Liquids","underlined":true},{"text":"
"},{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Potions can be stored in liquid tanks. Extended potions count as a three potions. Potions can be taken out by putting a bottle in the tank, but tanks will not output extended potions."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.potion_liquids.1"}]}]

["",{"translate":"%1$s%3427655$s","with":[{"text":"Mobs under a potion tank will gain the specific potion effect.

Shulkers on an tank will fill it with Levitation potion liquid.

Witches on an empty tank will fill it with Regeneration, Fire Resistance, Speed, or Instant Damage potion liquid."},{"translate":"text.gm4.guidebook.potion_liquids.2"}]}]
